Detailed Description

set of component objects that define the rendering attributes of a Mesh or Sprite3D. MeshやSprite3Dのレンダリング属性を定義するコンポーネントオブジェクトの集合.

void render ( RenderState &  state  )  const [virtual]

Render this object, inner use only.

Note: Appearance should be rendered only at second rendering pass(pass=2). In other cases, do nothing.

Reimplemented from Object3D.
